document.full_text: security personnel found the body of a pro-palestinian activist from italy who was killed and left in an abandoned house in the gaza strip following his abduction by militants, a hamas official said on friday.
document.title: abducted italian activist killed in gaza: hamas
lines_and_colors: security personnel found the body of a pro-palestinian activist from italy who was killed and left in an abandoned house in the gaza strip following his abduction by militants, a hamas official said on friday.
